official_title: Differential Changes in Ki67 Between Carriers and Noncarriers of BRCA2 Mutations With Estrogen Receptor-Positive, Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2-negative Breast Cancer Treated With Preoperative Endocrine Therapy
inclusion_criteria:
* Postmenopausal women aged â‰¥18 years with biopsy-proven stage I-III invasive breast cancer that is ER+/HER2-
* Scheduled to undergo upfront surgery
* Eligible for genetic testing in accordance with National Comprehensive Cancer Network guidelines
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* History of breast cancer
* Receipt of ET for risk reduction in the previous 3 months
* Stage IV disease at presentation
* Scheduled to undergo neoadjuvant systemic chemotherapy
* Pregnant
